channel.title: CVE Feed for Meinberg -- LTOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Meinberg -- LTOS

item.title: CVE-2023-1731|2023-05-23T05:49:20.632Z -- meinberg -- ltos
item.description: In Meinbergs LTOS versions prior to V7.06.013, the configuration file upload function would not correctly validate the input, which would allow an remote authenticated attacker with high privileges to execute arbitrary commands.
